attributes.action: Debate UNICEF donating to UK councils to make such donations unnecessary.
attributes.additional_details: It is embarrassing for the nation for large charities to see elements of society as so poor that they need the same support as countries suffering from natural or politically caused famine.
attributes.background: Provide sufficient funding to local councils to enable all children have a proper diet so that charities such as UNICEF don't see the need to make donations to those local councils.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:
 
End child food poverty – no child should be going hungry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554276

Take action to address the rising levels of child poverty: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552744
